name: Taxi Driving Sim 3D
description: Fasten your seat belt and get ready for the thrilling drive as a Taxi Driver! This taxi game is what you need! Become a real taxi driver in one of the best games. A unique gaming experience to feel like a real driver of city taxi.Enjoy Taxi Driving Sim 3D new simulator in stunning and gorgeous environments. Real drive needs of realistic environment and luxurious vehicles. Take the different cars for a high speed race! Pick up passengers from different locations and take them to their destination in time. Driving duty is not that easy. Reach on time to pickup or the passenger will cancel the ride. Get the customer into your taxi and drop them on their desired places.
